thought: To craft a green stained glass pane, I need to craft glass, which requires sand or red sand. I don't have any sand, but I do have red sand in slot 35. However, before I can use the red sand to craft glass, I need to smelt it. To do so, I will move the cactus from slot 11 to the furnace (slot 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 11 to slot 12 with quantity 1
